actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the printing of a revised edition of the Standing Rules of the Senate as a Senate document.

summary.text: Directs the Committee on Rules and Administration to prepare a revised edition of the Standing Rules of the Senate. Requires that such standing rules be printed as a Senate document. Provides for the printing of 2500 additional copies for the use of the Committee on Rules and Administration.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing of a revised edition of the Standing Rules of the Senate as a Senate document.
